articles.content: UPDATE:Barnes and Noble Phantasmal Flames preorders now open. Mega Charizard X Ultra Premium Collection is $129.99, Elite Trainer Box for $54.99 and Booster Bundle for $29.99. They're receiving high … [+2862 chars]
